verbs.description: Amid the noise and churn of the Trump administration - most recently about [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG0: the president] [V: paid] [ARG1: money] [ARGM-PNC: to silence Stormy Daniels] - Melania Trump has settled into a quieter routine , often apart from the president , raising their son and carving out a place for herself in a most untraditional White House .
